MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Lang.Object Clone ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a copy of this Object.

remarks.para: Creates and returns a copy of this Object. The default implementation returns a so-called "shallow" copy: It creates a new instance of the same class and then copies the field values (including object references) from this instance to the new instance. A "deep" copy, in contrast, would also recursively clone nested objects. A subclass that needs to implement this kind of cloning should call super.clone() to create the new instance and then create deep copies of the nested, mutable objects.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract byte[] EngineSign ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] EngineSign() cil managed

Docs.summary: Generates and returns the signature of all updated data.

remarks.para: Generates and returns the signature of all updated data.
This SignatureSpi instance is reset to the state of its last initialization for signing and thus can be used for another signature from the same identity.

Docs.exception: if this SignatureSpi instance is not initialized properly.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual int EngineSign (byte[] outbuf, int offset, int len);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 EngineSign(unsigned int8[] outbuf, int32 offset, int32 len) cil managed

Docs.param: the buffer to store the signature.
the index of the first byte in outbuf to store.
the number of bytes allocated for the signature.
Docs.summary: Generates and stores the signature of all updated data in the provided byte[] at the specified position with the specified length.

remarks.para: Generates and stores the signature of all updated data in the provided byte[] at the specified position with the specified length.
This SignatureSpi instance is reset to the state of its last initialization for signing and thus can be used for another signature from the same identity.

Docs.exception: if this SignatureSpi instance is not initialized properly.
if offset or len are not valid in respect to outbuf.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
